column5: been out trollin a couple of times but the dam fleas are so thick they are poping the lines off the rigger. Ive heard about some of these lines that are made with some jazz that the fleas cant stick too?? not only that but the stupid fleas are screwing with the spoon wobbles and what not any info on this would be splended!!!

Yes like spiel said thats the only way,other than running wire dipseys,or using 50-60-70lb test,they are verythick right now,and will be for a few more weeks,then they will die off,you must have not fished the big lake for a while its like this every year,you have to just get the fle-flicker,it works very well,get the 20lb test,and make sure you use quality snaps & swivels as the line really will twist bad....
